amendment.description: To require a Comptroller General of the United States report on the monitoring, compliance, and remediation of lead in military housing.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3857 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3857 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator Isakson to Amendment SA 3695. (consideration: CR S5901; text: CR S5901) To require a Comptroller General of the United States report on the monitoring, compliance, and remediation of lead in military housing.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3857 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator Isakson to Amendment SA 3695.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3857 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
